scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm run cv" "npm run auto-sync"
scripts.cv: node -e "const path=require('path'); const root=process.cwd(); const isWin=process.platform==='win32'; const py=isWin?path.join(root,'cv-service','.venv','Scripts','python.exe'):path.join(root,'cv-service','.venv','bin','python'); const {spawnSync}=require('child_process'); const res=spawnSync(py,['-m','uvicorn','app:app','--host','127.0.0.1','--port','8000'],{stdio:'inherit', cwd: path.join(root,'cv-service')}); process.exit(res.status||0);"
